EmailTemplate.name: 202011_APAC_Email_TPE331_DR.202011_APAC_Email1_TPE331_DR
EmailTemplate.subject: Need to repair your TPE331? TAE Aerospace can help you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Back in the 1960´s, TPE331 was Honeywell´s first turboprop engine. Developed for multiple applications within military, regional airline, agricultural and general aviation aircraft, the series now includes 18 engine models and 106 configurations.
Pilots that fly TPE331-powered aircrafts enjoy exceptional horsepower response and best-in-class fuel economy.
Want to add on that? TPE331 benefits also include quick throttle response for shorter take-offs, good power-to-weight ratio and long maintenance intervals.
And talking about maintenance, working with a Honeywell Authorized Channel Partner is the most cost-effective way to repair your TPE331 engine.
Authorized Channel Partners receive the best pricing on parts and have access to special programs to keep your engine event costs to a minimum. Besides, the parts installed on your aircraft are Honeywell certified parts that meet the original OEM requirements.
TAE Aerospace is a Honeywell Authorized Channel Partner and has been supporting worldwide operators of the TPE331 engine for more than 30 years.
Want to know more about them and find a location near you? Download the brochure attached and schedule your maintenance now! DOWNLOAD THE BROCHURE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/content/dam/aero/en-us/documents/landing-pages/brochures/N61-2533-000-000_TAE_Aerospace_TPE331-bro.pdf]]>
